  physical_appearance: This is an embroidered choli. It is a cropped yellow blouse
 with embroidered cross stitch motif along the chest and embroided floral designs along the sleeves. There is a pair of embroidered men on each side panel.

  subject_terms_1: tops (garments
 general) crosses (motif) blouses (main garments) flower (motif) embroidery (visual works) folk costume

  subject_terms_2: Blouses Ethnic costume Embroidery Jains

  subject_terms_3: Indian costumes

  subject_terms_4: 

  sgcool_label_text: This embroidered blouse would have been worn by a woman of the Kutchi Jain community. It features a cross-stitch like motif across the sleeves and chest
 with a pair of embroidered English gentlement embroidered on to the side panels on either side.
